entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as someone who must not know a secret until the last moment.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: A person talking to Dumbledore, asking questions about what Harry must do.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist in the story, mentioned as someone who will seem to fear for the life of his snake.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Lord Voldemort's snake, mentioned as a key factor in determining when it is safe to tell Harry a secret.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Harry's mother, mentioned as someone who cast her own life between Harry and Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The person talking to Severus Snape, explaining a secret that must be kept from Harry until the last moment.

relationships.description: Lord Voldemort owns Nagini, his snake.
Dumbledore must not tell Harry a secret until the last moment.
Lord Voldemort tried to kill Lily, but she cast her own life between him and Harry.
Dumbledore is talking to Severus Snape.
